metadata.title: CVE-2021-46340 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There is an Assertion 'context_p->stack_top_uint8 ==SCAN_STACK_TRY_STATEMENT || context_p->stack_top_uint8 ==SCAN_STACK_CATCH_STATEMENT' failed at/parser/js/js-scanner.c(scanner_scan_statement_end) in JerryScript 3.0.0.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
